name: The Dagger of Luna (Demo)
description:
STORY The mistake of a power hungry Queen turns her, and her people into a parasite of the universe. To survive, the Queen takes on a new host, an Astral princess named Luna. While the rest of her people spread to humans and Astrals.  Luna starts off her journey heading to the human capital city where she meets Rain, an Astral who was outcasted from the floating islands to Earth to be with the humans.  While fighting against the corruption plaguing her and others, Luna must find a way to prevent the universe’ demise with the help of friends who each carry burdens of their past to be solved. Will Luna change her fate or will the Queen return to revive her people, and continue their conquest of destruction for power. NOTE

This game is only a demo version a very pre-alpha version. Game was made using Rpg maker MV hope you enjoy! Let us know what you liked and what could be improved. Please, when sending feedback tell us how can we improve, we want to get better at what we do!

Thank you~

CREDITS
  • Story+Gameplay - SpetroRin
  • Title Screen Artist+ Co-Writer - Cattflorendo
FUTURE
  1. Updates to the demo for more exploration, and lore.
  2. Custom Animations.
  3. And more...

-Game ispired by classic JRPG´S such as Final Fantasy; Chrono Cross; Secrets of Mana etc...

Install Instructions
  • This game comes in Zip/RaR format, open it, and extract the main file. Once extracted open the file, click the "Dagger of Luna.exe" and there you go the game should run!
